General.Name: Anhui Kouzi Distillery Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Kouzi Distillery Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of liquor primarily in China. The company offers its products under the Kouzijiao, Laokouzi, Kouzifang, and Kouzi Wine brand names. Anhui Kouzi Distillery Co., Ltd. was founded in 1949 and is based in Huaibei, China.
General.Address: No. 9, Xiangshan South Road, Huaibei, China, 235199
